GovGenie is your comprehensive suite of tools designed to enhance collaboration, efficiency, and success in government contracting. Our latest addition, the GovGenie Chrome Extension, revolutionizes how you manage and capture opportunities.

With this extension, you can effortlessly pull opportunity and contract data from any procurement website directly into your GovGenie bid board. No more manual data entry or juggling between multiple platforms—this tool automates the process, ensuring that crucial information is instantly available to your team and teaming partners.

Why should you install it? Because time is money in government contracting. The GovGenie Chrome Extension speeds up your capture process, reduces the risk of missing critical opportunities, and keeps your entire team in sync. It's the tool you need to stay ahead of the competition, manage your contracts efficiently, and focus on what really matters—winning more contracts.

Install the GovGenie Chrome Extension today and experience the power of streamlined contracting.
